languages.text: "Забери тебя демоны, Кас. Угрожать вышибить мозги собственной дочурке на похоронах своего батюшки — это какая-то крайняя степень низости и тугодумия. Как ты был бесполезным отбросом, так и остался им до самого конца".

traits.locale_text: "Забери тебя демоны, Кас. Угрожать вышибить мозги собственной дочурке на похоронах своего батюшки — это какая-то крайняя степень низости и тугодумия. Как ты был бесполезным отбросом, так и остался им до самого конца".

languages.text: "Daemons take you, Kas. Threatening to murder your own daughter at your old man's funeral was a new low for you. You always were a useless waste, even in your final moments."
languages.original_text: "Забери тебя демоны, Кас. Угрожать вышибить мозги собственной дочурке на похоронах своего батюшки — это какая-то крайняя степень низости и тугодумия. Как ты был бесполезным отбросом, так и остался им до самого конца".

traits.locale_text: "Daemons take you, Kas. Threatening to murder your own daughter at your old man's funeral was a new low for you. You always were a useless waste, even in your final moments."
"Daemons take you, Kas. Threatening to murder your own daughter at your old man's funeral was a new low for you. You always were a useless waste, even in your final moments."
"Daemons take you, Kas. Threatening to murder your own daughter at your old man's funeral was a new low for you. You always were a useless waste, even in your final moments."
"Daemons take you, Kas. Threatening to murder your own daughter at your old man's funeral was a new low for you. You always were a useless waste, even in your final moments."
"Daemons take you, Kas. Threatening to murder your own daughter at your old man's funeral was a new low for you. You always were a useless waste, even in your final moments."

languages.text: 「キャス、ディーモンがあなたを連れて行くでしょう。老人の葬儀で、自らの娘の生命をも脅かすとは、類稀なるほどに最低な行為です。あなたはずっと、役立たずのクズでしたね。最期の瞬間までも」
languages.original_text: "Daemons take you, Kas. Threatening to murder your own daughter at your old man's funeral was a new low for you. You always were a useless waste, even in your final moments."

traits.locale_text: 「キャス、ディーモンがあなたを連れて行くでしょう。老人の葬儀で、自らの娘の生命をも脅かすとは、類稀なるほどに最低な行為です。あなたはずっと、役立たずのクズでしたね。最期の瞬間までも」

languages.text: “你可真该死，卡斯，居然在你老爹的葬礼上威胁要杀死自己的女儿。我早知道你是个废物，可没想到你居然是这样的人渣，临死的时候也一无是处。”
languages.original_text: "Daemons take you, Kas. Threatening to murder your own daughter at your old man's funeral was a new low for you. You always were a useless waste, even in your final moments."

traits.locale_text: “你可真该死，卡斯，居然在你老爹的葬礼上威胁要杀死自己的女儿。我早知道你是个废物，可没想到你居然是这样的人渣，临死的时候也一无是处。”

languages.text: « Que les démons vous emportent, Kas. Menacer d'assassiner votre propre fille à l'enterrement de votre père... Je ne pensais pas que vous puissiez tomber si bas. Même dans vos derniers instants, vous n'avez été qu'un gâchis de ressources. »
languages.original_text: "Daemons take you, Kas. Threatening to murder your own daughter at your old man's funeral was a new low for you. You always were a useless waste, even in your final moments."

traits.locale_text: « Que les démons vous emportent, Kas. Menacer d'assassiner votre propre fille à l'enterrement de votre père... Je ne pensais pas que vous puissiez tomber si bas. Même dans vos derniers instants, vous n'avez été qu'un gâchis de ressources. »

languages.text: «Que los daemons te lleven, Kas. Al amenazar con matar a tu propia hija en el funeral de tu padre has llegado más bajo que nunca. Siempre has sido un inútil, hasta en tus últimos momentos».
languages.original_text: "Daemons take you, Kas. Threatening to murder your own daughter at your old man's funeral was a new low for you. You always were a useless waste, even in your final moments."

traits.locale_text: «Que los daemons te lleven, Kas. Al amenazar con matar a tu propia hija en el funeral de tu padre has llegado más bajo que nunca. Siempre has sido un inútil, hasta en tus últimos momentos».

languages.text: "Dämonen sollen Euch holen, Kas. Auf der Beerdigung Eures alten Herrn zu drohen, Eure eigene Tochter zu töten, war selbst für Euch ein neuer Tiefpunkt. Ihr wart immer nutzloser Abschaum, selbst in Euren letzten Sekunden."
languages.original_text: "Daemons take you, Kas. Threatening to murder your own daughter at your old man's funeral was a new low for you. You always were a useless waste, even in your final moments."

traits.locale_text: "Dämonen sollen Euch holen, Kas. Auf der Beerdigung Eures alten Herrn zu drohen, Eure eigene Tochter zu töten, war selbst für Euch ein neuer Tiefpunkt. Ihr wart immer nutzloser Abschaum, selbst in Euren letzten Sekunden."

languages.text: "İblisler alsın seni Kas. Babanın cenazesinde öz kızını öldürmekle tehdit etmek de bir tek senden beklenirdi zaten. Ezelden beri işe yaramazın tekiydin, son anlarında da değişmedin."
languages.original_text: "Daemons take you, Kas. Threatening to murder your own daughter at your old man's funeral was a new low for you. You always were a useless waste, even in your final moments."

traits.locale_text: "İblisler görsün yüzünü Kas. Babanın cenazesinde öz kızını öldürmekle tehdit etmek sadece senden beklenecek bir hareketti. Ezelden beri işe yaramazın tekiydin, son anlarında da değişmedin."
